title: Abandon - Complete Discography - Swedish Sludge Doom
description:
All 3 albums by the Swedish sludge/doom/hardcore/whatever band.
Their lead singer died in 2009 so this is it. 

True northern darkness.
 <a href="
http://www.blackstarfoundation.com" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.blackstarfoundation.com</a>
